trans-unit.source: Specifies whether a property should be localized.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否應該當地語系化屬性。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: When code is generated for a component, members that are marked with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> set to `true` have their property values saved in resource files.
trans-unit.target: 當元件，以標記的成員會產生程式碼<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>設`true`其儲存在資源檔中的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: You can localize these resource files without modifying the code.
trans-unit.target: 您可以當地語系化這些資源檔，而不需修改程式碼。

trans-unit.source: By default, members that have no localizable attribute or are marked with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> set to `false` will have their property values persisted to code, if the data type allows.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，成員不能當地語系化的屬性或以標記<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>設`false`將擁有其屬性值保存至程式碼，如果資料類型允許。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the main component is set to `Localizable`, all properties will be persisted to the resource file.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果主要的元件會設定為`Localizable`，所有的內容將保存的資源檔。

trans-unit.source: The default is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 `false`。

trans-unit.source: When you mark a property with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> set to `true`, the value of this attribute is set to the constant member <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute.Yes>.
trans-unit.target: 當您將屬性標記與<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>設`true`，這個屬性的值設定為常數成員<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute.Yes>。

trans-unit.source: For a property marked with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> set to `false`, the value is <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute.No>.
trans-unit.target: 為屬性標記為<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>設`false`，這個值是<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute.No>。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you want to check the value of this attribute in your code, you must specify the attribute as <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute.Yes?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute.No?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，當您想要檢查您的程式碼中的此屬性的值，您必須指定屬性做為<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute.Yes?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute.No?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example marks a property as needing to be localized.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將屬性標示為需要當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: The next example shows how to check the value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> for `MyProperty`.
trans-unit.target: 下一個範例示範如何檢查的值<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>如`MyProperty`。

trans-unit.source: First, the code gets a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> with all the properties for the object.
trans-unit.target: 首先，程式碼會取得<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>含有物件的所有屬性。

trans-unit.source: Then, the code gets `MyProperty` from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 接著，程式碼會取得`MyProperty`從<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Next, it returns the attributes for this property and saves them in the attributes variable.
trans-unit.target: 接下來，它會傳回這個屬性的屬性，並將它們儲存在屬性變數。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the code sets `myAttribute` to the value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AttributeCollection> and checks whether the property needs to be localized.
trans-unit.target: 最後，此程式碼設定`myAttribute`值<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>中<xref:System.ComponentModel.AttributeCollection>，並檢查是否必須當地語系化的屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a property should be localized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性應該當地語系化則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following example marks a property as needing to be localized.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將屬性標示為需要當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: This code creates a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>, sets its value to <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute.Yes?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and binds it to the property.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼會建立新<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>，設定其值為<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute.Yes?displayProperty=nameWithType>，並將它繫結至屬性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the default value, which is <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute.No" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定預設值，即 <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute.No" />。

trans-unit.source: This <see langword="static" /> field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see langword="static" /> 欄位是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: When you mark a property with this value, this attribute is set to the constant member <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute.No>.
trans-unit.target: 當您要標示屬性與這個值時，這個屬性設為常數成員<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute.No>。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you want to check whether the attribute is set to this value in your code, you must specify the attribute as <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute.No?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，當您想要檢查屬性是否設定為這個程式碼中的值，您必須指定屬性做為<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute.No?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The object to test the value equality of.
trans-unit.target: 測試其數值相等的物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the value of the given object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，表示指定的物件值是否等於目前的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the value of the given object is equal to that of the current; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的物件值等於目前的值，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute" /> 的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Determines if this attribute is the default.
trans-unit.target: 判斷這個屬性是否為預設值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the attribute is the default value for this attribute class; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性是這個屬性類別的預設值，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a property should be localized.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示是否應該將屬性當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a property should be localized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性應該當地語系化則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to check the value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> for `MyProperty`.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何檢查的值<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>如`MyProperty`。

trans-unit.source: First, the code gets a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> with all the properties for the object.
trans-unit.target: 首先，程式碼會取得<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>含有物件的所有屬性。

trans-unit.source: Then, the code gets `MyProperty` from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 接著，程式碼會取得`MyProperty`從<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Next, it returns the attributes for this property and saves them in the attributes variable.
trans-unit.target: 接下來，它會傳回這個屬性的屬性，並將它們儲存在屬性變數。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the code sets `myAttribute` to the value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AttributeCollection> and checks whether the property needs to be localized.
trans-unit.target: 最後，此程式碼設定`myAttribute`值<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>中<xref:System.ComponentModel.AttributeCollection>，並檢查是否必須當地語系化的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a property should not be localized.
trans-unit.target: 指定屬性不應該當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: This <see langword="static" /> field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see langword="static" /> 欄位是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: This field is the default setting for this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是此屬性的預設設定。

trans-unit.source: When you mark a property with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> set to `false`, the value of this attribute is set to the constant member <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute.No>.
trans-unit.target: 當您將屬性標記與<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>設`false`，這個屬性的值設定為常數成員<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute.No>。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you want to check whether the attribute is set to this value in your code, you must specify the attribute as <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute.No?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，當您想要檢查屬性是否設定為這個程式碼中的值，您必須指定屬性做為<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute.No?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a property should be localized.
trans-unit.target: 指定屬性應該當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: This <see langword="static" /> field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see langword="static" /> 欄位是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: When you mark a property with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> set to `true`, the value of this attribute is set to the constant member <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute.Yes>.
trans-unit.target: 當您將屬性標記與<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>設`true`，這個屬性的值設定為常數成員<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute.Yes>。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you want to check whether the attribute is set to this value in your code, you must specify the attribute as <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute.Yes?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，當您想要檢查屬性是否設定為這個程式碼中的值，您必須指定屬性做為<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute.Yes?displayProperty=nameWithType>。
